chapters.title: Chapter 49: The Mirror of Mists
chapters.info: Rashima Kerenmosa, p. 622 (876)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah, later raised to the Amyrlin Seat. She is called the Soldier Amyrlin. Personally leading the Tower's armies, she won innumerable victories during the Trolloc Wars. Her body was discovered after the battle of Maighande surrounded by her five Warders and a large number of Trollocs and Myrddraal, including no fewer than nine Dreadlords. See also Amyrlin Seat.
